item.title: Unofficial tips for CKA and CKAD exams
item.description: I’ve taken both Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) and Certified Kubernetes Application Developer (CKAD) exams in the past 2 weeks and fortunately passed both. This is a blog article on tips for both exams based on my experiences. About the exam and its curriculum CKA focus on managing and operating kubernetes cluster including troubleshooting while CKAD forcus on managing and deploying applicaionts to kubernetes cluster. It’s very important to read and understand the exam curriculum and their relevant pages on kubernetes.
